body:
Would writing a wrapper function in the SWIG file work?
(Not for the same reason, but we hide `TF_SessionRun` from Python and instead use `TF_SessionRun_wrapper` in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/b8a9d163d9cbb4b581c044d9c4b1b256c801a9c4/tensorflow/python/client/tf_session.i#L482 )
body_html:
Would writing a wrapper function in the SWIG file work?
(Not for the same reason, but we hide TF_SessionRun from Python and instead use TF_SessionRun_wrapper in

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/client/tf_session.i

Line 482 in b8a9d16

// We use TF_SessionRun_wrapper instead of TF_SessionRun
)
body_text:
Would writing a wrapper function in the SWIG file work?
(Not for the same reason, but we hide TF_SessionRun from Python and instead use TF_SessionRun_wrapper in 
  
    
      tensorflow/tensorflow/python/client/tf_session.i
    
    
         Line 482
      in
      b8a9d16
    
    
    
    

        
          
           // We use TF_SessionRun_wrapper instead of TF_SessionRun 
        
    
  

 )
